name: HardKarma
description:
Roguelike MMO

Team-up in open world roguelike mmorpg. Epic loot, fast gameplay and high risk of death.

Bullethell &Permodeath combo

Dodge a lot of bullets, shoot enemies and try not die.

Designed for Isaac, Throne, Gundeon and RotMG fans
  • Lot of items that change the gameplay
  • Hard, dynamic and fun
  • More shooter than RPG

The game is very similar to the Realm of the mad god, but is hopefully better
